about_the_game:
Arcaxer is a turn-based VR RPG set in a virtual world besieged by violent entities. Take monsters face-to-face with first-person turn-based combat, while exploring the unusual world of Arcaxer in a 3rd-person god-like view.

See how far you can make it into the Stack, a tower which creates an endless number of randomly-generated dungeons to explore. Make it far enough in, and you might just end up taking on the elusive, and dangerous, Task Master.

KEY FEATURES




TURN-BASED COMBAT IN VIRTUAL REALITY!

Experience intense battles in first-person as you weave in and out of enemy attacks and physically utilise the abilities and attacks in your arsenal. It’s just like turn-based games when you were a kid, except now you’re in the midst of it.



EXPLORE A HUGE VR WORLD

Discover a world teeming with friends and foes alike during a 20+ hour campaign. Learn about the hostile force known as the Toxin, chase down the elusive ‘Task Master’ and meet a unique cast of characters along the way.



UNIQUE PLAYER CLASSES

Choose between five classic RPG-inspired character classes, each with a unique playstyle reimagined for an absolutely out-of-this-world and intensely-immersive VR experience.

  • Fighter - Deliver damaging physical attacks with your own body
  • Mage - Utilise Hax, Arcaxer’s equivalent to magic, to deal damage from afar
  • Thief - Make use of unique wildcard abilities to turn the tide of fights
  • Blue Mage - Claim the powerful abilities of monsters as your own
  • Dark Knight - Borrows random abilities from other classes, always exciting!



PROCEDURALLY GENERATED DUNGEONS TO EXPLORE AND CONQUER

Explore The Stack, a never-ending series of procedurally-generated dungeons that grow in challenge the further you explore. Fear not, each journey through The Stack will reward you with new loot and items, making your character even stronger.



PLAY FUN MINIGAMES

Fancy a break from the onslaught of enemies? Arcaxer has a number of minigames designed to help you better get to grips with the mechanics. You’ll also earn additional experience for blowing some steam off.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Arcaxer is a turn-based VR RPG with first-person action-oriented combat & a third-person god-view overworld. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, claim equipment, & discover abilities in a science fiction simulation full of colorful AI characters & surprises. Choose your class & climb The Stack.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
